comprehensive_overview: Network Security Services (NSS) is a set of libraries designed to support cross-platform development of security-enabled client and server applications. It provides a complete open-source implementation of cryptographic libraries supporting Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) and Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols.
core_features:
1. SSL and TLS encryption support
2. Cross-platform compatibility
3. Cryptographic libraries for secure communication
4. Open-source implementation
5. Secure client-server applications development
